title: Alexis Plaquet
text:
I am a second year PhD student at IRIT (Toulouse, France) and I work on interactive approaches for speaker diarization, my goal is to find how to make the most out of human time to improve speaker diarization performance. I work under the supervision of HervÃ© Bredin.
